item.description:
From the Boston Red Sox:

Fenway Park is 100 years. On Thursday, April 19 from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm there is an Open House at Fenway Park  - completely free to the public. There will be games for the kids, autograph signings, and you will be able to walk along the warning track and peek inside the Green Monster.

Bring your camera.

Any Natives attending should coordinate by E Mailing each other to pick a time to meet.
item.how_to_find_us: Yes RSVPs E Mail each other for meeting time
item.name: Free Open House to the Public at Fenway Park to Celebrate it's 100th Anniversary
